title: ‘A Better Version of Gravel:’ Why Gravel Fans Should Care about Marathon MTB Worlds This Weekend
content:
"Gravel is the gateway discipline to distance MTB riding," says dual discipline athlete Haley Smith. "If you like gravel, chances are you’d like marathon MTB even more."

Read the full article at ‘A Better Version of Gravel:’ Why Gravel Fans Should Care about Marathon MTB Worlds This Weekend on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
